resources.string: Jot Down anything you want to achieve, today or in the future
Different goals, different way to jot it down
Text area, checklist, or some combination. Adapt with your needs
Every big step start with small step.\nNotes your first idea and start\nyour journey!
Once you create a note and finish it.\nIt will be appeared on this screen.\nSo, let\'s start your journey
